channel.title: How to make a weapon hit harder. (PI)
channel.description: Lets take for excample a ags. The max spec i've seen with it on my server is a 59 with tons of strength bounus. I want it to it harder and more accurate. (over powered) how would i do this? (PI)

item.title: How to make a weapon hit harder. (PI)
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

underdrive thats correct but for the spec accuracy if you want it to hit high almost every single time you would go to combastassisant and search for

			case 11694: // ags
			c.startAnimation(7074);
			c.specDamage = 1.25;
			c.specAccuracy = 1.85;
			c.gfx0(1222);
			c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
			break;

something that looks like that and where it says

c.specAccuracy = 1.85; that high the accuracy is =p

and if you want the spec to hit higher then without spec
you will edit

			c.specDamage = 1.25;

=p

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a weapon hit harder. (PI)

item.title: How to make a weapon hit harder. (PI)
item.dc:creator: @x_united_x x united x
item.description:
@x_united_x wrote:

[quote=“underdrive, post:2, topic:367917”]Well go into items.cfg and look for armadyl godsword.
After you find that go to the side you will se abunch of numbers
The second 2 last number is the str bounus change it to what you want i think it should say 132? and the other numbers represent the other bonuses it gives just edit those[/quote]

lmao i remember when i helped you with this about a day ago

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a weapon hit harder. (PI)
item.dc:creator: @underdrive underdrive
item.description:
@underdrive wrote:

Well go into items.cfg and look for armadyl godsword.
After you find that go to the side you will se abunch of numbers
The second 2 last number is the str bounus change it to what you want i think it should say 132? and the other numbers represent the other bonuses it gives just edit those
